page.title: 04RECREATION part 2
page.content: The typical penge inhabitants view of Crystal Palace National Recreation Centre depends on his/her athleticism; for sporting types it is a godsend, while for the not-so-energetic at least the surrounding park, with its zoo and lake, are fine for a pleasant stroll. Sports Council research shows that the 'regulars' who use their facilities without being affiliated to any club, come from within a three-mile radius (indicating that a fair number of Penge inhabitants are enthusiastic, if not extremely athletic). Martial Arts are now one of the major participation sports...could this be a reflection on the public reaction to street crime in the area?
